title: Sales of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: In the united , the most popular television programs are by far those within the drama category . A 2017 study showed that 33 percent of primetime tv programs were drama shows , almost double the share of comedy or reality programs . What affects genre preferences ? An interesting way in which the popularity of a genre can change is looking at data pertaining to a viewer 's age .
gold: The statistic shows the unit sales of streaming devices in the United States in 2014 . 8.8 million units of the Apple TV streaming device are forecast to be sold in the United States in 2014 .
